data.text:
Surya and Chitra are outstanding service housekeeping 

My stay are fantastic service  very nice room and service was great  near airport and metro station location very nice housekeeping services was outstanding services mr Surya and Mr.    Chitra are very nice helpful staff
data.title: Surya  Chitra housekeeping services

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest 228bishhnup,
Greetings from Holiday Inn Express Dubai Airport! We are all thrilled to received positive feedback towards to Surya, Chitta with the high rate from you and thank you for taking the time to share it with us is much appreciated. We’re glad to know that you had a good experience during your stay with us. Our hotel aims to provide a truly unique experience and we are delighted that we were able to meet your expectations. We look forward of welcoming you back to our hotel in the future.
Best Regards,
owner_response.author: Ahmed Abdel Nabi

data.text: We stayed here as part of the Emerites Experience Stopover Programme so we got a great deal on the hotel. We chose this hotel as our flights were at abnormal times so this hotel offered a shuttle bus from the airport and 24hour check in. The room was a good size. Fridge and kettle was available in the room. The beds were clean and very comfortable. Bathroom was a good size. Rooms were basic decor but neat and tidy. The hotel currently has works going on but only during the hours o 9-5, it only affected us when we went for a sleep during he day. The breakfast was included and offered a big selection. The staff were very friendly. There is a grocers next door for supplies if needed. The hotel is less than a 10 min walk to the metro station.
data.title: Good Hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest sarah_marykelly,
Thank you for staying at Holiday Inn Express Dubai Airport and for taking time to share your great review.
I was delighted to read that our Select Service Model hotel met your needs as a smart Traveller, our Free Express Start Breakfast, great location, clean and comfortable rooms, free WIFI access and the service provided to you by our polite and helpful staff.
It was very wonderful to know that you had a great stay with us.
We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel again soon.
owner_response.author: Ahmed Abdel Nabi

data.text: We enjoyed trip to Riyadh since we started from Medina. The highway is nice and smooth. Riyadh is very nice for a couple of days hangout. Though we couldn't go out as much as wanted due to the weather. Late afternoon was our time. A big city where we could see the sky always. No much high rise buildings. Lots of open space around. Numerous food choices. Nice places to pass quality time.
data.title: Glimpse of Riyadh

data.text: Staff are amazing, service is very neat and clean. Staff very nice and kind. They are providing good service and the breakfast is nice too. Everything is well organzanized and east to follow. I can recommend Rishabh, he’s a very good cleaner and kind
data.title: Great

data.text:
The hotel location is very convenient near the airport and metro (5 min walk).
Hotel management Mr. Haroun & staff are very friendly and capable of handling transit groups checkin & out at short time. House keeping and maintenance are excellent namely Rishab. 
Restaurant food variety at breakfast and dinner is good and restaurant staff are also very friendly and active. 
The overall hotel spirit is friendly and makes you feel at home in spite of being an “Express Hotel” dealing with transit groups and passengers.
data.title: The Place to stay if you want to be near DXB airport.
